title: GOP Bill Backfires? Bagel Bites Lies?! 5.5.21
itunes:title: GOP Bill Backfires? Bagel Bites Lies?! 5.5.21
description:
In episode 902, Jack and Miles are joined by Gangster Party Line's Brent Weinbach to discuss a GOP bill backfiring, the James O'Keefe Project Veritas music video, Bagel Bites committing cheese fraud, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. WATCH: Dave Koz - You Make Me Smile (Beverly Hills 90210)
  2. Dave Koz Cruise
  3. Florida Republicans rushed to curb mail voting after Trump’s attacks on the practice. Now some fear it could lower GOP turnout.
  4. WATCH: Project Veritas - OLIGARCHY (Official Video)
  5. Lawsuit alleges cheese fraud in Bagel Bites Pizza Snacks
  6. LISTEN: Beyonce - Still Tippin x DIVA Queen Bey Only V1 (Smochi & Excez Edit)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
